description: Inama ku babyeyi n’abandi bita ku bana:
title: Inama ku babyeyi n’abandi bita ku bana:
content:
- Kuryamisha umwana ahantu hasukuye, harambuye kandi hari    
   umutekano kugira ngo ashobore kwegera ibyo akeneye gufata;
 - Gukomeza gufata umwana no kumuguyaguya buri munsi    
   umugaragariza urukundo;
 - Gufata umwana ku buryo ashobora kubona ibibera ha aho;
 - Gukomeza konsa umwana amanywa n’ijoro uko abikeneye, no
   gutangira kumuha imfashabere (kumugaburira kabiri kugeza
   kuri gatatu ku munsi guhera ku mezi 6; gatatu kugera kuri kane    
   guhera ku mezi 9)
 - Kuvugisha no kuririmbira umwana kenshi, atari uko ashonje    
   cyangwa agiye gusinzira
